page.title: 12TOW LAW, CO. DURHAM
page.content: On the outskirts of Tow Law there is an estate of small factories which have been built to attract firms into the area as many people are unemployed. At the moment,however,few of the factories are in use. Nearby there is a small engineering firm making castings but the main employers are the surrounding farms. { Tow Law has shops,pubs,cafes,and an {hotel. There are two primary schools; {the County school and a R.C. Aided {school.There are 3 churches; R.C., {Methodist and Church of England. The only bank is quite busy when the fortnightly cattle mart sale is on. { Just recently a B.M.X. track has been {built on a piece of waste land and it {is hoped that a new Community Centre {will soon be built to replace the one {which had to be demolished early in {1985.
